website_summaries.verdict: Excellent collection of sockets that sits at top of market. High quality materials for long lifespan.
pros: Impact sockets contain chromium-molybdenum alloy steel that will last through many uses
Contains both shallow and deep sockets for reaching fasteners in tight spots
Socket's design prevents wear on the fastener
Socket's weight is comfortable to use
cons: Price point comes in higher than some others
Case could be of a higher quality to keep sockets organized

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the worst blow mold cases possible. Couldn't be made worst if you tried.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible cases, worst I've ever seen. Absolutely disappointing. No space or time to deal with these. Ashamed to say it but my Proto 12point rails take the abuse from my 1/2 drive Impact. Isn't worth the space in either of my job boxes to try to deal with these cases. If I was a mechanic and had slide rail drawers... I'd have tossed the cases and reviewed the sockets but the cases fall apart first use and the sockets go everywhere and I don't have the time nor patience to deal with these.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: These were built out of the Old School strength!
customer_reviews.text: The nice red case it came in had the front two clasps broken off, which I'll blame on handling. I'm very satisfied with the product, itself. The sockets are impact-duty and thick-walled. I've been using these for awhile now and see no possibility of damaging them. They are properly machined to not round the edges of nuts, and fit snugly as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great set of impact sockets at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great sockets ! I have used Sunnex for a long time and they are good tools. The only complaint is the package arrived and it looked like it had been drug behind the delivery truck. The carry case was busted up and all the latches where broken off. The sockets survived just fine but the carry case is useless now.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Forst

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: For impacts, I don't think Sunex can be beat. I'm seeing Sunex impact socket sets in a lot of 'die-hard' Snap-On Tool boxes. If professional mechanics that buy only the best choose to own Sunex.....that should tell you something.
customer_reviews.author: StratCat

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well built set
customer_reviews.text: Recently got a cordless impact driver, so I needed the sockets to work with it. I'd seen reviews of this one, and took a chance. These are great! Granted, I haven't used them much, but they lock in well, and are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Solidly made
customer_reviews.text: Made with CR-MO metal, and came in oiled. The case it came seem like it would last for A short while until i need to put it in a heavy duty bag. I purchased these to use on meter lugs for 750 kcmil conductors and below. So far, they hold up and fit tightly into the lugs I work with. I expect this set to last throughout my career as an electrician. I wished I got this set from the start that way I will not need to buy another ever.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Serious socket set
customer_reviews.text: This is a serious socket set. I've not yet used these, but I am very impressed with this set already. This is a big, heavy set in a large, sturdy case. I've had these sitting in my Amazon shopping cart for years and I now that I finally ordered them and they arrived, I was immediately regretful that I didn't order them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Best sockets for the money
customer_reviews.text: I have been a mechanic for over 15 years and i still have the first set of Sunnex sockets they hold up just as good as snap-on for a fraction of the price. I just recently bought this kit because I wanted another set on hand for my other toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable tools
customer_reviews.text: The tools are durable and an excellent value for the price. The set’s carrying case showed up damaged thanks to the shipping company, and Amazon immediately sent another set. My husband is an iron worker. These tools hold up to him.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Randleas

customer_reviews.title: Complete set, great quality low price
customer_reviews.text: This set is a complete set, I decide to buy it because I already had a 1/2 deep set and its been thru hell 10 yearswith me. So betting on the quality of my deep set I decided to go for this master set, its great and best of all it wont break you bank. Compares to high name brands and doesn't disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Esau garza

customer_reviews.title: Very Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set for work, and I wasn't expecting it to be as durable as it is due to the cost. They are very well made and can take a beating. I burned up a new Milwaukee 1/2 in. Impact while using the 15" extension and the 1 1/8 socket. Barely any show for wear on the tools. My dad liked them so much I got him a set for Father's Day. Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: Case doesn't hold up on the durability side
customer_reviews.text: Case doesn't hold up on the durability side. When the case showed up it was already missing a latch, and now the case and came completely apart.
customer_reviews.author: dallas cotts

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this socket set and case. Bought them for the convenience of using on my service truck
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy

customer_reviews.title: Good sockets with a bad case
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat these sockets for the price. I’ve been more than happy with their performance but the case arrived with a lot of damage. Bother side tabs were completely broken off and there was a large dent in the front. As someone who works on a mobile operation, having quality tool cases is a must. If you work out of a stationary toolbox, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sunex impact sockets
customer_reviews.text: Sunex is a bad to the bone brand these sockets will take anything to put them against, Don't hecitate and think about them twice, beats the tool trucks price to. Thanks sunex! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Padrote

customer_reviews.title: Great package deal
customer_reviews.text: Awesome socket set for the price. Work great! I purchased this set when I switched jobs and started working on school buses. Needed a big selection of socket sizes and this price was a lot better then buying off a tool truck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best bang for your buck. Use this kit daily. Great organization. Just grab and go no worries
customer_reviews.author: Richard Marth

customer_reviews.title: Solid Performance and Value
customer_reviews.text: These sockets are well made an deliver the impact torque effectively.
customer_reviews.author: James Cogil

customer_reviews.title: They work as intended
customer_reviews.text: My roommate uses these for work, and they help out pretty well!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Princess

customer_reviews.title: good tools
customer_reviews.text: Still all in one piece, but my impact is not very strong. Nice front latches, stupid side latches. I did find it that sunnex manufactures off brands for, I believe, Matco
customer_reviews.author: Doug P.

customer_reviews.title: As I was anticipating
customer_reviews.text: The set is massive and covers every size in sae for most uses. I'm buying the metric set next, Always happy with amazing prime shipping and the sunex brand tools
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is quality and a good set with a good box
customer_reviews.text: F that tool truck! This stuff is quality and a good set with a good box!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: We sent it directly to the jobsite but I've not heard anything bad about them so we'll count this as a good ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and intact. We sent it directly to the jobsite but I've not heard anything bad about them so we'll count this as a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rivenwood

customer_reviews.title: These are such great tools and the storage case is a huge plus
customer_reviews.text: These are such great tools and the storage case is a huge plus. I have gotten rid of all my "extra" sockets because I'll never break these. I have 2 other sets and feel the same about those also.
customer_reviews.author: A W

customer_reviews.title: Everything I needed in one box!
customer_reviews.text: Everything I needed in one box. Great tools for the price. Have gotten a lot of use out of them and expect they will last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: This set is really nice and worth the money. The box came broken though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It helps to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, deep and shallow and all the size sockets I could possibly use....
customer_reviews.author: Errol S Barrett Jr

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: You will not find a more complete set of quality sockets without spending much more
customer_reviews.author: Rhys Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great value, a lot of sockets in one place to do most any thing you need.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Wi

customer_reviews.title: Good sockets
customer_reviews.text: Good sockets, used on tractor trailers daily no issues, one of best swivels I’ve ever used
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Seal

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice set deffenately heavy duty just what i needed thanks great product
customer_reviews.author: Anthonygreen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Works nice very tough socket set work on heavy equipment and bet these sockets up 6 days a week with no issues at all
customer_reviews.author: Justin McCarville

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Good sockets. Have gotten really hot on me and haven’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got a great deal on the set, and so far they have stood up to use.
customer_reviews.author: Fredrick Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Got exactly what I was expecting...great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price
customer_reviews.text: I'm a heavy equipment mechanic I use them every day for 3 years now still no problems with them
customer_reviews.author: russell Imel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best tools for the price. they have done every job I put them up to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sockets love how it comes in the storage and ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sockets love how it comes in the storage and transportable case. I am a diesel mechanic use these sockets almost everyday and confident they won't fail me for a while
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Quality Product For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: Incredible product for the price. Bought to use with my battery operated Milwaukee 1/2" drive impact, & couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: FergFam

customer_reviews.title: Great impact tool set
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice to have a complete set of impact sockets and I won't have to abuse my non-impact sockets again. This set is complete and will last my lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, all inclusive set (no skipped sizes) in ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality, all inclusive set (no skipped sizes) in a case that keeps everything neat and organized. Great to keep in the truck.
customer_reviews.author: John Edmund O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: massive set has all you need 1/2in just pick up a ratchet
customer_reviews.author: zach

customer_reviews.title: The tabs that hold the case closed were damaged during ...
customer_reviews.text: The tabs that hold the case closed were damaged during shipping. Other than that they're sockets and they spin right and left
customer_reviews.author: Alex Davis

customer_reviews.title: The box came and it was broken...
customer_reviews.text: The box came and it was broken... So now I have to use a clamp to keep the tools from falling out
customer_reviews.author: adam c.

product_meta.title: Sunex 2568, 1/2 Inch Drive Master Impact Socket Set, 43-Piece, SAE, 3/8 Inch - 1-1/2 Inch, Standard/Deep, Cr-Mo Alloy Steel, Radius Corner Design, Dual Size Markings, Heavy Duty Storage Case
product_meta.description: The Sunex 2568 1/2” Drive Master Impact Socket Set includes SAE sizes from 3/8” to 1-1/2” in standard and deep lengths. This set also includes 4 impact extension and a universal joint. Each socket has been forged from Cr-Mo alloy steel, designed with radius corners, made with chamfered openings, and marked by both laser etching and roll stamping to ensure permanent socket identification. All of this ensures our sockets’ professional-level performance--conveniently stored in one heavy duty storage case. Meets ANSI Standards.
feature_bullets: LIFETIME WARRANTY WITH SUNEXPRESS: Get in the express lane with the industry’s leading warranty program and exchange warranted products directly with Sunex.
CR-MO STEEL: Provides the strength and flexibility to handle high torque impact tools.
RADIUS CORNER DESIGN: Reduces wear and increases torque on fasteners by placing force on fastener walls rather than fastener corners.
CHAMFERED OPENING: Quickly aligns fastener to socket.
DUAL SIZE MARKINGS: Laser etched and roll stamped markings to ensure permanent socket identification.
HEAVY DUTY STORAGE CASE: Convenient impact socket transport and storage.
MEETS ANSI STANDARDS: All sockets are rigorously tested, ensuring peak performance and durability.
FULL COMPLEMENT OF EXTENSIONS: Provides access to virtually all recessed fasteners.
UNIVERSAL JOINT: Adapts any socket for use in swivel applications.

specifications.Style: ½” Dr Impact Socket Set SAE+Ext
